name: Bleu's Heist
description:
Bleu's Heist is a stealth game about sneaking through a building to nab all the jewels. 

The only problem is the more jewels you are carrying, the more noise you make.

-------------------------------------

Instructions:
- WASD or arrow keys to move
- Space to jump
- Q to fire a grappling hook straight up
- F to pick up jewels
- G to drop jewels

Wall jumping and climbing, as well as ceiling walking are available to you to avoid the guards, get spotted for too long and it's game over. 
Stash all the jewels in the container as fast as possible to win!

Have fun!

-------------------------------------
